revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sky Pillar |image = [[File:Sky Pillar.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Sky Pillar. |tokens = 34,000 |location = Southwest of Sootopolis City, north of Route 131. }} '''Sky Pillar''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || colspan=2 rowspan=6|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye |- | [[File:Claydol.png|40px]] Claydol |- | [[File:Banette.png|40px]] Banette |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile |- | [[File:Altaria.png|40px]] Altaria |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops || <center>3,200,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Rayquaza.png|40px]] Rayquaza || <center>5,824,002 |- |}
